column3: There is a ban preventing child from attending
column4: The child's disability or health issues prevents them from accessing school
column5: Child participating in income generating activities outside of the home
column6: Child needs to work at home or on the household's own farm
column7: Discrimination or stigmatization of the child for any reason
column8: Unable to enroll in school due to recent displacement/return
column9: The child has already graduated from secondary education
column10: School does not have enough classrooms that are usable
column11: There is a lack of interest/Education is not a priority either for the child or the household
column12: Lack of appropriate and accessible school
column13: Lack of or poor quality of teachers
column15: Cannot afford the direct costs of education
column16: No school in the area or school is too far
column17: Curriculum and/or the certificates issued by school are not perceived to be useful for the household
column18: School's WASH facilities are in poor condition or not available
column19: Protection risks whilst at the school
column21: Protection risks whilst travelling to the school
column22: School has been closed due to damage, natural disaster, conflict
column23: Unable to enroll in school due to lack of documentation
column26: Child is associated with armed forces or armed groups
column27: School has been closed due to natural disaster
